Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Ariel Manrique
Dear Sir,
Ariel Manrique shouldn't play at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .170 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Status of Kenneth Rios
Dear Sir,
Kenneth Rios has an AVG of .233 at AA Sticky Wicketts!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director
